mezzanine_1.name: Mezzanine West
mezzanine_1.descriptionPrimary: 4,5,6 trains one level down. 7 train two levels down. Shuttle to Times Square on this level through westward passageway.

signs.name: North
signs.message: Exit to Grand Central terminal and street level

signs.name: West
signs.message: Passageway to Shuttle to Times Squa

signs.name: North
signs.message: Exit to Grand Central terminal and street level

signs.name: West

passageway_3.name: Shuttle Train Passageway
passageway_3.descriptionPrimary: Passageway connecting main Mezzanine and the Shuttle to Times Square.
